verses.verse: בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> My son תּוֹרָתִ֣י <S%H8451><s%> not my law אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁכָּ֑ח <S%H7911><s%> forget וּ֝מִצְוֹתַ֗י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments יִצֹּ֥ר <S%H5341><s%> keep לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H3820><s%> but let thine heart

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For אֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> For length יָ֭מִים <S%H3117><s%> of days וּשְׁנ֣וֹת <S%H8141><s%> and long חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> life וְ֝שָׁל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> and peace יוֹסִ֥יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> shall they add לָֽךְ׃

חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Let not mercy וֶאֱמֶ֗ת <S%H571><s%> and truth אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יַעַ֫זְבֻ֥ךָ <S%H5800><s%> forsake קָשְׁרֵ֥ם <S%H7194><s%> thee bind עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> around גַּרְגְּרוֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H1621><s%> them about thy neck כָּ֝תְבֵ֗ם <S%H3789><s%> write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> around ל֥וּחַ <S%H3871><s%> them upon the table לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H3820><s%> of thine heart

וּמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> So shalt thou find חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> favour וְשֵֽׂכֶל־ <S%H7922><s%> understanding ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and good בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> of God וְאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> and man פ

בְּטַ֣ח <S%H982><s%> Trust אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לִבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3820><s%> with all thine heart וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on בִּֽ֝ינָתְךָ֗ <S%H998><s%> not unto thine own understanding אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשָּׁעֵֽן׃ <S%H8172><s%> and lean

בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּרָכֶ֥יךָ <S%H1870><s%> In all thy ways דָעֵ֑הוּ <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge וְ֝ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> and He יְיַשֵּׁ֥ר <S%H3474><s%> him and he shall direct אֹֽרְחֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H734><s%> thy paths

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become חָכָ֣ם <S%H2450><s%> Be not wise בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thine own eyes יְרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְס֣וּר <S%H5493><s%> and depart מֵרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> from evil
רִ֭פְאוּת <S%H7500><s%> It shall be health תְּהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become לְשָׁרֶּ֑ךָ <S%H8270><s%> to thy navel וְ֝שִׁקּ֗וּי <S%H8250><s%> and marrow לְעַצְמוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6106><s%> to thy bones

כַּבֵּ֣ד <S%H3513><s%> Honour אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מֵהוֹנֶ֑ךָ <S%H1952><s%> with thy substance וּ֝מֵרֵאשִׁ֗ית <S%H7225><s%> and with the firstfruits כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all תְּבוּאָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8393><s%> of all thine increase

וְיִמָּלְא֣וּ <S%H4390><s%> be filled אֲסָמֶ֣יךָ <S%H618><s%> So shall thy barns שָׂבָ֑ע <S%H7647><s%> with plenty וְ֝תִיר֗וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> with new wine יְקָבֶ֥יךָ <S%H3342><s%> and thy presses יִפְרֹֽצוּ׃ <S%H6555><s%> shall burst out פ

מוּסַ֣ר <S%H4148><s%> not the chastening יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> My son אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּמְאָ֑ס <S%H3988><s%> despise וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּ֝קֹ֗ץ <S%H6973><s%> neither be weary בְּתוֹכַחְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H8433><s%> of his correction

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom יֶאֱהַ֣ב <S%H157><s%> loveth יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For whom the LORD יוֹכִ֑יחַ <S%H3198><s%> he correcteth וּ֝כְאָ֗ב <S%H1><s%> even as a father אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> the son יִרְצֶֽה׃ <S%H7521><s%> [in whom] he delighteth

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> Happy אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> [is] the man מָצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> [that] findeth חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וְ֝אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> and the man יָפִ֥יק <S%H6329><s%> [that] getteth תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <S%H8394><s%> understanding

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> of it [is] better סַ֭חְרָהּ <S%H5504><s%> For the merchandise מִסְּחַר־ <S%H5505><s%> than the merchandise כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וּ֝מֵחָר֗וּץ <S%H2742><s%> thereof than fine gold תְּבוּאָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H8393><s%> and the gain

יְקָ֣רָה <S%H3368><s%> She [is] more precious הִ֭יא <S%H1931><s%> he [מִפְּנִיִּים כ] (מִפְּנִינִ֑ים <S%H6443><s%> ruby ק) וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> you חֲ֝פָצֶ֗יךָ <S%H2656><s%> and all the things thou canst desire לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִֽשְׁווּ־ <S%H7737><s%> are not to be compared בָֽהּ׃

אֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> Length יָ֭מִים <S%H3117><s%> of days בִּֽימִינָ֑הּ <S%H3225><s%> [is] in her right hand בִּ֝שְׂמֹאולָ֗הּ <S%H8040><s%> [and] in her left hand עֹ֣שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> riches וְכָבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> and honour

דְּרָכֶ֥יהָ <S%H1870><s%> Her ways דַרְכֵי־ <S%H1870><s%> [are] ways נֹ֑עַם <S%H5278><s%> of pleasantness וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all נְתִ֖יבוֹתֶ֣יהָ <S%H5410><s%> and all her paths שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> [are] peace

עֵץ־ <S%H6086><s%> She [is] a tree חַיִּ֣ים <S%H2416><s%> of life הִ֭יא <S%H1931><s%> who לַמַּחֲזִיקִ֣ים <S%H2388><s%> to them that lay hold בָּ֑הּ וְֽתֹמְכֶ֥יהָ <S%H8551><s%> [is every one] that retaineth מְאֻשָּֽׁר׃ <S%H833><s%> upon her and happy פ

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בְּחָכְמָ֥ה <S%H2451><s%> by wisdom יָֽסַד־ <S%H3245><s%> hath founded אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth כּוֹנֵ֥ן <S%H3559><s%> hath he established שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens בִּתְבוּנָֽה׃ <S%H8394><s%> by understanding

בְּ֭דַעְתּוֹ <S%H1847><s%> By his knowledge תְּהוֹמ֣וֹת <S%H8415><s%> the depths נִבְקָ֑עוּ <S%H1234><s%> are broken up וּ֝שְׁחָקִ֗ים <S%H7834><s%> and the clouds יִרְעֲפוּ־ <S%H7491><s%> drop down טָֽל׃ <S%H2919><s%> the dew

בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> My son אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יָלֻ֣זוּ <S%H3868><s%> let not them depart מֵעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> from thine eyes נְצֹ֥ר <S%H5341><s%> keep תֻּ֝שִׁיָּ֗ה <S%H8454><s%> sound wisdom וּמְזִמָּֽה׃ <S%H4209><s%> and discretion
וְיִֽהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become חַיִּ֣ים <S%H2416><s%> So shall they be life לְנַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H5315><s%> unto thy soul וְ֝חֵ֗ן <S%H2580><s%> and grace לְגַרְגְּרֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1621><s%> to thy neck

אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> Then תֵּלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will walk לָבֶ֣טַח <S%H983><s%> safely דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <S%H1870><s%> in thy way וְ֝רַגְלְךָ֗ <S%H7272><s%> and thy foot לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not תִגּֽוֹף׃ <S%H5062><s%> shall not stumble

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> When תִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> When thou liest down לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִפְחָ֑ד <S%H6342><s%> thou shalt not be afraid וְ֝שָׁכַבְתָּ֗ <S%H7901><s%> yea thou shalt lie down וְֽעָרְבָ֥ה <S%H6149><s%> shall be sweet שְׁנָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8142><s%> and thy sleep

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor תִּ֭ירָא <S%H3372><s%> Be not afraid מִפַּ֣חַד <S%H6343><s%> fear פִּתְאֹ֑ם <S%H6597><s%> of sudden וּמִשֹּׁאַ֥ת <S%H7722><s%> neither of the desolation רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when תָבֹֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> when it cometh

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְכִסְלֶ֑ךָ <S%H3689><s%> shall be thy confidence וְשָׁמַ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> and shall keep רַגְלְךָ֣ <S%H7272><s%> thy foot מִלָּֽכֶד׃ <S%H3921><s%> from being taken אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּמְנַע־ <S%H4513><s%> deny

ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> not good מִבְּעָלָ֑יו <S%H1167><s%> from them to whom it is due בִּהְי֨וֹת <S%H1961><s%> is in לְאֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> when it is in the power [יָדֶיךָ כ] (יָדְךָ֣ <S%H3027><s%> able ק) לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> to do

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֹּ֘אמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Say [לְרֵעֶיךָ כ] (לְרֵֽעֲךָ֨ <S%H7453><s%> brother ק) לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וָ֭שׁוּב <S%H7725><s%> and come again וּמָחָ֥ר <S%H4279><s%> and to morrow אֶתֵּ֗ן <S%H5414><s%> I will give וְיֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> when thou hast אִתָּֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּחֲרֹ֣שׁ <S%H7451><s%> not evil עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against רֵעֲךָ֣ <S%H7453><s%> against thy neighbour רָעָ֑ה <S%H2790><s%> Devise וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> seeing he dwelleth לָבֶ֣טַח <S%H983><s%> securely אִתָּֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> beside

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay [תָּרֹוב כ] (תָּרִ֣יב <S%H7378><s%> adversary ק) עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> not with a man חִנָּ֑ם <S%H2600><s%> without cause אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> no גְמָלְךָ֣ <S%H1580><s%> if he have done רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> thee no harm

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּ֭קַנֵּא <S%H7065><s%> Envy בְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> A man חָמָ֑ס <S%H2555><s%> of violence וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֝בְחַ֗ר <S%H977><s%> and choose בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any דְּרָכָֽיו׃ <S%H1870><s%> none of his ways

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for תוֹעֲבַ֣ת <S%H8441><s%> [is] abomination יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD נָל֑וֹז <S%H3868><s%> For the froward וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְשָׁרִ֥ים <S%H3477><s%> [is] with the righteous סוֹדֽוֹ׃ <S%H5475><s%> but his secret

מְאֵרַ֣ת <S%H3994><s%> The curse יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> [is] in the house רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked וּנְוֵ֖ה <S%H5116><s%> the habitation צַדִּיקִ֣ים <S%H6662><s%> of the just יְבָרֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1288><s%> but he blesseth

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though לַלֵּצִ֥ים <S%H3887><s%> Surely he scorneth הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he יָלִ֑יץ <S%H3887><s%> the scorners [וְלַעֲנִיִּים כ] (וְ֝לַעֲנָוִ֗ים <S%H6041><s%> afflicted ק) יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> but he giveth חֵֽן׃ <S%H2580><s%> grace

כָּ֭בוֹד <S%H3519><s%> glory חֲכָמִ֣ים <S%H2450><s%> The wise יִנְחָ֑לוּ <S%H5157><s%> shall inherit וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים <S%H3684><s%> of fools מֵרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> shall be the promotion קָלֽוֹן׃ <S%H7036><s%> but shame פ
